Superior_Attuned_Superior_Blasters_Wrath.display_name: Superior Blaster's Wrath: Recharge/Chance for Fire Damage
Superior_Attuned_Superior_Blasters_Wrath.display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the slotted power a chance to inflict moderate fire damage and reduces the power's recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement's chance to trigger is equal to approximately 5 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Blasters and may be slotted into any Blaster damage power and requires the user to be level 50.
Superior_Attuned_Superior_Blasters_Wrath.display_short_help: Increases Attack Rate, Chance for Fire Damage

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
